titles.title: Save Our Seas 2.0 Amendments Act
Save Our Seas 2.0 Amendments Act
Save Our Seas 2.0 Amendments Act
Save Our Seas 2.0 Amendments Act
Save Our Seas 2.0 Amendments Act

A bill to amend the Save Our Seas 2.0 Act to improve the administration of the Marine Debris Foundation, to amend the Marine Debris Act to improve the administration of the Marine Debris Program of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Cruz without amendment. With written report No. 119-12.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 40.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Johnson (SD) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 216.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: Senate Commerce, Science, and Transportation
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations
